src_original: saṃprajānamṛṣāvādo kho punar āyuṣmanto āntarāyiko dharmo ukto bhagavatā /  tasmāt smaramāṇena bhikṣuṇā āpannena viśuddhiprekṣeṇa santī āpattī āviṣkartavyā /
tgt_original: 諸大德！ 故妄語罪，佛說障道法，是故比丘欲求清淨故，憶有罪應發露，發露則安隱，不發露罪益深。 」「諸大德！

src_original: // [iti] nidānaṃ //  ime kho punar āyuṣmanto catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti /
tgt_original: 」「諸大德！ 是四波羅夷法，半月半月次說波羅提木叉。

src_original: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pār.1. yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣūṇāṃ śikṣāsāmīcīsamāpanno śikṣām apratyākhyāya  api sādham ayaṃ bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo,  na labhate bhikṣūhi sārdhasaṃvāsaṃ /
tgt_original: 「若比丘，於和合僧中受具足戒，不還戒、戒羸不出、相行婬法乃至共畜生，是比丘波羅夷不共住。

src_original: idaṃ bhagavatā veśālīyaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ pañcavarṣābhisaṃbuddhena hemantapakṣe pañcame,  divase dvādaśame,
tgt_original: 「佛在毘舍離城，成佛五年冬分第五半月十二日，食後東向坐一人半影，為長老耶奢伽蘭陀子制此戒。

src_original: aṣṭamo vargaḥ //  PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.82. yo puna bhikṣu rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya janapadasthāmavīryaprāptasya antaḥpuraṃ praviśeyāniṣkrānte rājāne,  aniṣkrānte antaḥpure,  anirgatehi ratanehi antamaśato indrakīlaṃ pi atikrameya pācattikaṃ /
tgt_original: 「若比丘入王宮，夫人未藏寶，下至過門限，波夜提。

src_original: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.83. yo puna bhikṣu dantamayaṃ vā asthimayaṃ vā śṛṅgamayaṃ vā suvarṇamayaṃ vā rūpyamayaṃ vā ratanamayaṃ vā sūcīvigrahaṃ kārāpeya bhedanapācattikaṃ /
tgt_original: 「若比丘，骨牙角作針筒，破已，波夜提。

src_original: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.84. mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena sugatāṣṭāṅgulapramāṇāḥ pādakāḥ kārāpayitavyāḥ anyatrāṭṭanīye,
tgt_original: 「若比丘，作床脚應高佛八指，除入梐。

src_original: taduttariṃ kārāpeya cchedanapācattikaṃ /
tgt_original: 若過，截已，波夜提。

src_original: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.85. yo puna bhikṣuḥ tūlasaṃstṛte mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdeya vā abhi[ni]padyeya vā uddālanapācattikaṃ /
tgt_original: 「若比丘，兜羅綿紵褥，若坐、若臥，出已，波夜提。

src_original: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.86. niṣīdanaṃ bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena prāmāṇikaṃ kārāpayitavyaṃ /
tgt_original: 「若比丘，作尼師壇應量作：

src_original: tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ Ō dīrghaśo dve vitastīyo sugatavitastinā tiryag dvyardham anyatra daśavitastikaṃ /  taduttariṃ kārāpeya cchedanapācattikaṃ /
tgt_original: 長二修伽陀磔手、廣一磔手半，更益一磔手。 若過，截已，波夜提。

src_original: tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ Ō dīrghaśo catvāri vitastīyo sugatavitastinā, tiryag dve /  taduttariṃ kārāpeya cchedanapācattikaṃ /
tgt_original: 「若比丘，作覆瘡衣應長四修伽陀磔手、廣二磔手。 若過，截已，波夜提。

src_original: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.88. varṣāśāṭikā bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena prāmāṇikā kārāpayitavyā /  tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ Ō dīrghaśo ṣaḍvitastīyo sugatavitastinā,  tiryag aḍḍhatīyaṃ /  taduttariṃ kārāpeya cchedanapācattikaṃ /
tgt_original: 「若比丘，作雨浴衣應長六修伽陀磔手、廣二磔手半。 若過，截已，波夜提。

src_original: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.89. yo puna bhikṣuḥ sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpeya Ō kiñca tasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sugatasya
tgt_original: 「若比丘，與如來衣量等作衣。

src_original: dirghaśo nava vitastīyo sugatavitastinā, tiryak ṣaṭ /  idaṃ tasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sugatasya sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ /  tato vā punar uttariṃ kārāpeya cchedanapācattikaṃ /
tgt_original: 若過，截已，波夜提。 如來衣長九修伽陀磔手、廣六磔手。

src_original: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.90. yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya duṣṭo doṣāt kupito anāttamano amūlakena saṃghātiśeṣeṇa dharmeṇānudhvaṃseya pācattikaṃ /
tgt_original: 「若比丘，瞋恨不喜，以無根僧伽婆尸沙法謗，波夜提。 「若比丘，知物向僧迴與餘人，波夜提。 「若比丘，僧半月說波羅提木叉經時，作是言： 『長老！

src_original: idānīṃ punar ahaṃ jānāmi Ō ayaṃ pi dharmo sūtrāgato sūtraparyāpanno anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchati /
tgt_original: 我今始知是法入修多羅，半月波羅提木叉中說。

src_original: yāvad ahaṃ na jānāmi tāvan nāstītthaṃ mahyam āpattir jāneṃsu ca te bhikṣu taṃ bhikṣuṃ sakṛd dvikkhuto trikkhuto āgatapūrvaṃ pi sanniṣaṇṇapūrvaṃ  kaḥ punar vādo bahuśo /
tgt_original: 』諸比丘知彼比丘本若二、若三，說《波羅提木叉經》中坐，況復多！

src_original: nāsti kho punas tasya bhikṣusya ajñānena muktiḥ /
tgt_original: 彼比丘不以不知故無罪。

src_original: atha khu yāṃ pi ca so bhikṣur āpattim āpanno tāṃ kṣipram eva yathādharmmaṃ yathāvinayaṃ kārāpayitavyo,  uttariṃ ca saṃmoham āpādayitavyo /
tgt_original: 隨所犯罪一一如法治，應呵責言：

src_original: tasya te āyuṣman lābhā durlabdhā yas tvaṃ anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddiśyamāne nāsthīkṛtvā na manasikṛtvā na sarvacetasā samanvāhṛtya avahitaśroto satkṛtya dharmaṃ śṛṇoṣīti /
tgt_original: 『長老！
